actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on October 1, 2024.

The House received a message from the Acting Clerk. Pursuant to the permission granted in Clause 2(h) of Rule II of the Rules of the U.S. House of Representatives, the Acting Clerk notified the House that he had received the following message from the Secretary of the Senate on September 26, 2024, at 12:15 p.m.: That the Senate passed S. 91, S. 275, S. 1570, S. 3475, S. 3698, S. 4293, S. 4489, S. 5284, and S. 5292, Senate agreed to S. Res. 888 and H. Con. Res. 127, Senate passed H.R. 4190, H.R. 7189, and H.R. 7777. Appointments: Social Security Advisory Board, State and Local Enforcement Congressional Badge of Bravery Board, Commission on Reform and Modernization of the Department of State, and Public Safety Officer Medal of Valor Review Board.
The Chair designated Mr. Mooney to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Dr. Darin M. Wood, First Baptist Church, Midland, TX
The Speaker designated the Honorable Mike Bost to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
